2.1.name: wordpress/textile-2
2.1.description:
This is a wrapper with configuration panel for Jim Riggs' PHPTextile implementation. Due to non-development by Jim, with the 2.1 release the Textile2 plugin will be incorporating bug fixes independently of Jim's release.

Once installed, you can use Hobix's Textile Reference to get an idea of what Textile2 can do. Or view Brad Choate's examples of what you can do with a Textile2.pm workalike.
